actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to require full and complete public disclosure of the terms of home mortgages held by Members of Congress.
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text: Amends the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require Members of Congress to include in mandatory annual financial disclosure reports information on the balance of any mortgage secured by a personal residence.

titles.title: A bill to require full and complete public disclosure of the terms of home mortgages held by Members of Congress.
